0015547a976f70beb5a26d886dfa4cf39fb283b2.query:
WITH a AS (
            SELECT
                b.time_stamp - LAG(b.time_stamp) OVER (ORDER BY b.time_stamp) AS diff
            FROM beats b
        )
        SELECT
            COUNT(DISTINCT (b.device, b.time_stamp)) AS num_beats,
            EXTRACT('epoch' FROM MAX(a.diff))::BIGINT AS longest_absence,
            MAX(b.time_stamp) AS last_beat,
            d.id,
            d.name
        FROM a, beats b JOIN devices d ON b.device = d.id
        GROUP BY d.id

1b45a0b819bdd1e8d39b9e94de9efc8f296d2b46.query:
WITH dummy AS (
                INSERT INTO stats (_id)
                VALUES (0)
                ON CONFLICT (_id) DO NOTHING
            )
            SELECT server_start_time
            FROM stats
            WHERE _id = 0;

563994798fb75320bd2b62651ebd840504a37163.query:
WITH a AS (
        SELECT
            b.time_stamp - LAG(b.time_stamp) OVER (ORDER BY b.time_stamp) AS diff
        FROM beats b
    )
    SELECT
        COUNT(DISTINCT (b.device, b.time_stamp)) AS num_beats,
        EXTRACT('epoch' FROM MAX(a.diff))::BIGINT AS longest_absence,
        MAX(b.time_stamp) AS last_beat,
        d.id,
        d.name
    FROM a, beats b JOIN devices d ON b.device = d.id
    GROUP BY d.id

9f7d92aa600835acd2c1454e4f1ab8e8742cf24d.query:
INSERT INTO STATS (_id, total_visits)
        VALUES (0, 1)
        ON CONFLICT (_id) DO UPDATE
        SET total_visits = stats.total_visits + 1;

b391443664741aabbdb2121ae4f0b1e7e4327e6a.query: INSERT INTO devices (id, name, token) VALUES ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING *;

bb345b1dc8cf752501674ec91d01737a88141b64.query:
WITH dummy AS (
        INSERT INTO beats (time_stamp, device) VALUES ($1, $2)
    )
    SELECT time_stamp
    FROM beats
    ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
    LIMIT 1;

bdc2fae028ae62504f3ef216f38ecfc1337f5412.query: SELECT id, name FROM devices WHERE token = $1;
